verses.verse: When <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went forth <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, The <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> from a <S%H5971>people<s%> of strange <S%H3937>language<s%>;
What aileth <S%H3220>thee<s%>, O thou sea, that thou <S%H5127>fleest<s%>? Thou <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, that thou <S%H5437>turnest<s%> <S%H268>back<s%>?
Ye <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, that ye <S%H7540>skip<s%> like <S%H352>rams<s%>; Ye little <S%H1389>hills<s%>, like <S%H1121>lambs<s%>?
Tremble <S%H2342><s%>, thou <S%H776>earth<s%>, at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H113>Lord<s%>, At the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H433>God<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>,
Who <S%H2015>turned<s%> the <S%H6697>rock<s%> into a <S%H98>pool<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>, The <S%H2496>flint<s%> into a <S%H4599>fountain<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%>.
